title: Shen Qi Huan Qi Tan
alternative_title: The Legend of Ancient Soul, 神契幻奇谭
description: Years ago, the gods fought against each other before being sealed away. However their artifacts remained in the souls of the HuaXia clan as part of a contract and hope that someday in the future, they will awaken once more using those artifacts.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Mystery>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
